cast.overview: Two psychotic young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.
cast.title: Funny Games

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Arno Frisch (born 13 November 1975) is an Austrian actor. He has had central roles in two films by Michael Haneke, namely, Benny's Video and Funny Games.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Arno Frisch, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Arno Frisch
